Name: Quash
About the game: Quash is an immersive arcade game in which you control a racket allowing you to destroy gigantic walls standing in front of you. Achieving the highest score, beating time with the level, never losing the ball are challenges that you will encounter in game. The solo campaign offers a challenge adapted to all players and allows you to progress between each level. A multiplayer gives you the opportunity to defeat your friends. Features: A game for everyone: Anyone can pick up the controller and play the game. Itâ€™s as simple as doing a racket sport Solo campaign: Get better at every level, every level is unique and challenges you on several skills Multiplayer: Defy your friends in 4 different maps Best music possible: made by the incredible Pierrick Querolle Exercise: Quash is a great way to exercise while smashing bricks!
